caption:
Happy Nurses Week to all of our nurse besties! We want to give you some love which is why we have teamed up with @CeraVe, @connectRN, and @Subway to give you the best prizes and honor you with the recognition that you deserve!

Best part? We’ve got over 100 prizes to giveaway! 

🎁 PRIZES UP FOR GRABS:
🩺 40 nurses will receive a @CeraVe gift box valued at more than $100 #CeraVepartner
🩺 40 nurses will win a $25 @Subway gift card #subwaypartner 
🩺 20 nurses will score a $100 AmEx gift card from our friends at @connectRN #connectRNpartner 

⭐️ To enter, simply visit the link in bio and enter your email. We’ll randomly select winners the week of 5/12. That’s it! Super simple. 

🩺 Share this with a fellow nurse friend, or better yet tag them in a comment below. 

Giveaway is not associated with Meta. Giveaway closes 5/12 2359 EST. Winners will be contacted after the giveaway period closes via email. Winners must be located in the United States and must be 18 years or older at the time of entry. By entering, you agree to The Nursing Beat’s Terms & Conditions.

#sponsored
